title: Need help identifying font
content:
Hey guys, I run an independent theatre in Boise and we're looking for the font from our old logo to carry over into our new logo, but need some help identifying the "HGT". Help please!

| Attachment | Size |
| --- | --- |
| [HGT\_Change3-3.jpg](http://web.archive.org/web/20150415143711/http:/typophile.com/files/HGT_Change3-3.jpg) | 478.55 KB |
author: HomeGrownTheatre
